name: Vegan Waffles
description: You are going to love these classic vegan waffles! They are super quick and easy to make and they are golden crispy on the outside and perfectly fluffy on the inside. We love them as breakfast and dessert!
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons melted coconut oil or canola oil
3 tablespoons coconut sugar or brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients for the vegan waffles in a medium bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients for the vegan waffles in a medium bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a hand whisk, stir well until all lumps are removed. The batter will be quite thin. Don't worry, that's normal!
recipeInstructions.name: Using a hand whisk, stir well until all lumps are removed. The batter will be quite thin. Don't worry, that's normal!

recipeInstructions.text: Heat your waffle maker and grease it with coconut oil or canola oil on both sides (top and bottom). Pour the batter with a ladle into the waffle iron. It depends on your waffle maker how much batter you need, so check the manufacturer instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat your waffle maker and grease it with coconut oil or canola oil on both sides (top and bottom). Pour the batter with a ladle into the waffle iron. It depends on your waffle maker how much batter you need, so check the manufacturer instructions.

recipeInstructions.text: Close your waffle maker and bake the waffles for about 5 minutes until they're golden and crispy on the outside. Don't open the waffle maker too early.
recipeInstructions.name: Close your waffle maker and bake the waffles for about 5 minutes until they're golden and crispy on the outside. Don't open the waffle maker too early.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the waffles immediately with maple syrup and berries or other fruits. Enjoy!
